newsitem.title: USA: Cambridge sells stake to Creative. [CORRECTED 19:55 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Cambridge sells stake to Creative. [CORRECTED 19:55 GMT]

text.p: Cambridge SoundWorks Inc Friday said Creative Technology Ltd will acquire 19.5 percent of Cambridge SoundWorks common stock and warrants amounting to 5.5 percent of the company's fully diluted shares.

As a result of Creative's investment, Cambridge SoundWorks will create a complete line of multimedia speakers, and Creative will have exclusive distribution rights for Cambridge SoundWorks multimedia speakers.

Under terms of the agreement Cambridge SoundWorks will issue and sell to Creative 912,294 shares of its common stock at a purchase price of $5.25 per share, together with a warrant to purchase an additional 257,314 shares of common stock at an exercise price of $6.00 per share. Creative's acquisition of the shares, not including the warrants, will increase the number of Cambridge SoundWorks' issued and outstanding shares of common stock to 3,801,693.
(Company corrects number of shares to 3,801,693 from 31,801,693).
Creative Technology is a provider of advanced multimedia products and peripherals for personal computers.
